resources.string: You can contact and book the nearest ambulance from your location to pick patient up. the application will be able to provide with some first aid information. In cases a user needs blood, a notification will be sent to their friends. the application will show users with pharmacies and blood banks near him. Patient will get accurate arrival times of their Ambulances. The application will decide on the basis of the injury, the nearest hospital. the application will calculate the shortest path to reach the destination hospital. The application will also calculate the less traffic routes to reach to the destination.\n\n"
